chara.textHome:
I'm Riko Chiaki, I work at Chiaki's,
the neighborhood bento shop!
I like math and being on lunch duty!

My dad, mom, and teachers say
I'm very well-behaved!

Our shop's best bento has
fried chicken and a healthy salad!
I really recommend trying it!
It's always super busy at the bento shop.

That's why when I'm helping out there,
it's like family time.
It's all about working together as a family!

The shop needs to be cleaned
in the evening, so Dad's at home then!

This is kind of embarrassing, but...
sometimes we still take a bath together.
But that's a secret!

I'll use my color pick to make things
even prettier!

Spin 'round, and ta-da!
See, I look different now, right?!

I think I'll run the shop like my mom one day,
so I have to become a strong woman!

Miss K from next door always
looked after me.

My dream is to be kind and have a
wonderful smile like her, and help look
after her baby like she did for me.
I'm pretty much ready now, don't you think?
Huh?
Ah, we meet again!
Uhh, no, I'm not crying.
I mean, it's not like I feel lonely or anything.
I'm strong!
This is what mornings are all about!
Making a bento before going out!

The Chiaki bento shop puts a lot of
hard work into making these,
so leaving leftovers is not allowed.

I really shine when I've got
lunch duty at school!

But I always give extra big servings, so
the teacher gets a little mad sometimes...
Nice to meet you, I'm Riko Chiaki!

I'm proud of having lots of energy
and being well-behaved!

I always try my hardest,
so I won't let you down!
It's sooo busy right now!

Night time gets pretty crazy with
Dad coming home from work,
Mom doing the shopping,
and Mameji yapping his heart out!

It's a little lonely at night, but I get that
Mom and Dad are working really hard.

Plus, I feel better when Mameji snuggles up
and sniffs me, so it's okay.
I was just out playing with my friends.

I have lots of friends even though
I'm so busy.
We were reading each other's manga.

Wow, is that what it feels like
when a Witch is close by?!

I already know, where there's a Witch,
people are in danger!

I better get rid of it before I go
help at the shop!

Umm, is it really okay for Magical Girls
to fight each other?
Wha?
Oh, they're copies!
Then this is no problem for me!
Nnngh. *Munch* *Munch*
See?

Sh-shiitake mushrooms are fine
if I pinch my nose...
I work at a food shop, so I'm not fussy!
Open the bag like whoosh!
Like this, whoosh!

That's my technique for bagging bentos.
The trick is to stick your hand in and
do a whoosh and open it!
There's a hardware store next door.

That's where Miss K used to live!
I love her!

She moved far away, so I don't
get to see her very much.

Weeell... I'm pretty good at doing
fractions in math, but reading is so tough...

Like here, can you tell me
how to say this word?
Hehe, this bandana is my treasure!
Miss K from next door gave it to me.
I always have it on when I help at the shop!

Ah, the girl from the bamboo studio
is a regular at our shop..
She comes to buy side dishes sometimes.
I heard she has a twin sister. I'm so jealous

Hmmm, if I compared them to food...
Mayu is like soft, fluffy cotton candy!
And Ria...
She'd be, like, poppy popcorn, maybe?
Manaka is so amazing.

She's great at cooking, she's a chef,
I respect her so much!
She's such a cool person!

My mom and dad said they first met
each other at the Chiaki bento shop.

Gee, I wonder if my Prince Charming
will turn out to be a customer, too...
*Giggle*

Leave the bento bagging
and the Witch fighting to me!
I'm growing up too, you know!

A smile is key, whether working
at the shop or fighting Witches!

What do you think?!
Am I kinda like Miss K now?
It's not easy being the face of Chiaki's!

I don't just bag things.
I do lots of stuff, I'm really growing!

Since I'm doing this well, maybe my mom
will teach me some cooking!

Let's take a bento to the park and chat.
Mameji's coming too.

The bento shop opens
really early in the morning!
Only Mom's at home when I wake up.
Dad's already preparing things by 5 AM!
